item.title: Ernst won’t seek reelection, giving Democrats opening in battle for Senate
item.description: Ernst, 55, was first elected to the Senate in 2014 and comfortably won reelection in 2020.

item.title: Bowser welcomes federal law enforcement presence indefinitely
item.description: Bowser issued an executive order Tuesday requiring local coordination with federal law enforcement “to the maximum extent allowable by law.” The order...

item.title: Trump to move U.S. Space Command headquarters from Colorado to Alabama
item.description: The president’s Oval Office announcement marks the latest twist in a years-long partisan battle over the agency’s home.

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Trump amps up rhetoric toward Chicago as Democrats prepare for showdown
item.description: The president has not detailed any plans for Chicago but has said it would be “probably next” after he sent the National Guard to D.C.
